name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-open-ai-search-file-upload-nodejs
title: Teams Azure Open AI Embeddings And Redis Search based On Uploaded File Using Bot
shortDescription: This Azure Open AI sample app demonstrates the user search functionality using Azure Open AI embeddings and completion APIs.
longDescription: This Azure Open AI sample app demonstrates the user search functionality based on Azure Open AI embeddings, Redis DB search and completion APIs for user queries, and it is based on files uploaded by an admin using a bot.

metadata.value: bot, messaging, file-upload, open-ai, redis search

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing Teams Azure Open AI Embeddings, Redis DB search on uploaded file using bot
